alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Weber and northern Davis Counties through 1115 AM MDT... At 1100 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Uintah, or over Hill Air Force Base, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Hill Air Force Base, South Ogden, Washington Terrace, South Weber, Uintah and Snowbasin. This includes Interstate 84 between mile markers 85 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
